string.value: Rainbow week, during which you can benefit from the seven colors of the rainbow, has started. They say that #b#p9010010##k can cast Red Monday magic on you...
Red Monday. With #b#p9010010##k's magic, you can receive bonus EXP when hunting monsters. The magic will last all day on April 19.\r\nReceive #r#x10450# additional EXP when hunting #b#r#M10450##b.
Red Monday was a day for hunting designated monsters! You received bonus EXP while hunting monsters thanks to #b#p9010010##k's magic.
Red Monday is a #bDesignated Monster Hunting Day.#k Are you ready to have fun hunting today?
You might regret it if you miss out today!
Oh? You want to stop hunting already? If you stop now, the effects of the Red Monday magic will disappear. But not to worry, you can talk to me again to receive a new magic effect.

\r\nYou can obtain an extra #r#x10450##b#k EXP when hunting #r#M10450#s#b. If you want to select a different monster, press the Q button to open the Quest window, forfeit the quest, and then talk to me again.
